title: Ticket #7302: Add HTCondor-CE configuration template for SSL authN
description:
For HTCondor-CE, we want to give users the ability to easily configure their CE to authenticate SSL connections using standard grid locations: 

AUTH_SSL_SERVER_CERTFILE = /etc/grid-security/hostcert.pem
AUTH_SSL_SERVER_KEYFILE = /etc/grid-security/hostkey.pem
AUTH_SSL_SERVER_CADIR = /etc/grid-security/certificates
AUTH_SSL_CLIENT_CADIR = /etc/grid-security/certificates
AUTH_SSL_SERVER_CAFILE =
AUTH_SSL_CLIENT_CAFILE =

We were attempting to wrap this in if CE.USE_GRID_CERTS but unfortunately if blocks are evaluated at parse time.
